name: FatRunners
description:
A game made by Deren Saylik and Matthias Voigt

FatRunners is a local two player game where you try to eat your way out, while shooting cookies at your opponent. Don't get caught by the evil witch pudding though! Have fun! And remember: Bigger is alwayss better!

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Florian Berger and Prof. Sebastian Stamm
